org.phantomapi.sfx

Interface Audible

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Audio, GSound

    public interface Audible
    Allows you to wrap either objects or more folders of wrappers into one audible object allowing multiple sounds at different pitches and volumes be played with one object
    Author:
    cyberpwn
